title: Jersey Daze
description: A contemporary holiday romance set in New Jersey. Julianna Hastings had to put her grief for her father and stepmother on hold when she had to assume custody of her younger siblings. When she loses them in a custody hearing, her grief is too much with which to cope. Jeremy Davies runs a successful business. While looking for his next Executive Secretary, he is pulled into the fun and loving Hastings family circle. When Julianna falls apart, Jeremy wants to be the one to help her put her and her family back together. Another watches and wants Julianna and all that Jeremy has, will he break their new family apart?First Edition No longer Available
author: G.D. Steel
